author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft Fixes Critical Hacking Team Security Bug in Windows Media Center
text: Microsoft rolled out a total of 12 security updates on this month’s Patch Tuesday, and five of them were rated as critical, but one of those labeled as important can be considered at least as critical as the others. MS15-100 is an update supposed to address a vulnerability in Windows Media Center, which, according to Microsoft, has n... »
